Texts.Chs: 恰恰拉印象深刻！仲裁者难以击倒，容器是一个不错的奖品。恰恰拉可以用它制造武器，但是要付钱。
Texts.Eng: Chacharra impressed! Justicar difficult to take down, container a good prize. Chacharra can make weapon from it, for price.

Texts.Chs: 找到位于^orange;克里昂大使馆^reset;的^orange;恰恰拉^reset;
我发现了一个大容器，里面装满了活洁酸，以前应该是一架仲裁者用来驱动武器用的。^green;我应该找一个精通活洁武器的阿基马里人^white;——也许他们可以用这个容器给我做个新武器。
Texts.Eng: I found a large container full of Vaash acid, previously used by a Justicar to power its weapons. ^green;I should find an Akkimari who knows their way around Vaash weapons ^white;- perhaps they can fashion a new weapon for me using this container.
